name: Hoppit!
description:
This is a movement and adventure based game where you are playing as  a frog who must hop and leap their way through the forest to find their friends.

Navigate through the obstacles and environment as a frog to get through the game and reach the  wonderous land at the end.

The goal of this game for the player to use skills and your knowledge of a frog to navigate through the map with hops and leaps and experience movement through another being , the challenges and advantages that come with it.

Assets are not my own except for the lily pads :) - KC

Player Controls

A and D to rotate the player

W to hop forward

Hold Spacebar to charge and leap

R to return to last checkpoint

Process

In Game

* Turn Hardware Acceleration on in Chrome browser if lagging *

Enjoy hopping through the game, thanks for playing!

This game was created by KC Tovera & Selina Zhang

Programing, Coding, Concept Art, Asset Creation and Research done by all team members.
